Copy the file content

ssh-rsa  vagrant insecure public key
ssh-ed25519 AAAAC3NzaC1lZDI1NTE5AAAAIN1YdxBpNlzxDqfJyw/QKow1F+wvG9hXGoqiysfJOn5Y vagrant insecure public key
